mapper.update: UPDATE WD_REZ SET REZ_FULL_PRICE = (SELECT B.H_PRICE+(B.H_FOOD*B.H_MIN)+C.S_PRICE+D.D_PRICE+E.M_PRICE+(A.M_PLUS_NUM*E.M_PLUS) REZ_FULL_PRICE FROM WD_REZ A, WD_HALL B, WD_STUDIO C, WD_DRESS D, WD_MAKEUP E WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.WH_CODE = B.WH_CODE AND A.H_CODE = B.H_CODE AND A.S_CODE = C.S_CODE AND A.DC_CODE = D.DC_CODE AND A.D_NO = D.D_NO AND A.M_CODE = E.M_CODE) WHERE REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}

UPDATE WD_REZ SET DC_CODE = '', D_NO = ''
WHERE REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}

UPDATE WD_REZ
SET WH_CODE = '', H_CODE = '' WHERE REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE WD_REZ SET S_CODE = '', S_DATE = NULL WHERE REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE WD_REZ SET REZ_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND REZ_STATUS = 'N'

mapper.select: SELECT REZ_NO, WH_CODE, H_CODE, S_CODE, DC_CODE, D_NO, M_CODE, M_PLUS_NUM, REZ_STATUS, REZ_DATE, WDATE, USER_ID, REZ_FULL_PRICE, C_CODE, REZ_POINT, S_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, REZ_NO, WH_CODE, H_CODE, S_CODE, DC_CODE, D_NO, M_CODE, M_PLUS_NUM, REZ_STATUS, REZ_DATE, WDATE, USER_ID, REZ_FULL_PRICE, C_CODE, REZ_POINT, S_DATE FROM( SELECT REZ_NO, NVL(WH_CODE, '') AS WH_CODE, NVL(H_CODE, '') AS H_CODE, NVL(S_CODE, '') AS S_CODE, NVL(DC_CODE, '') AS DC_CODE, NVL(D_NO, '') AS D_NO, NVL(M_CODE, '') AS M_CODE, NVL(M_PLUS_NUM, 0) AS M_PLUS_NUM, NVL(REZ_STATUS, 'Y') AS REZ_STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REZ_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REZ_DATE, NVL(WDATE, '') AS WDATE, USER_ID, NVL(REZ_FULL_PRICE, 0) AS REZ_FULL_PRICE, NVL(C_CODE, '') AS C_CODE, NVL(REZ_POINT, 0) AS REZ_POINT, NVL(S_DATE, '') AS S_DATE FROM WD_REZ WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND REZ_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REZ_NO DESC)) WHERE RNUM <= 10 AND RNUM >= 1
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_REZ SET REZ_STATUS = 'D' WHERE REZ_NO = #{value} AND REZ_STATUS = 'C'

UPDATE (SELECT R.REZ_FULL_PRICE, U.U_POINT, R.REZ_STATUS, R.USER_ID, R.REZ_NO FROM WD_REZ R, WD_USER U WHERE R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND R.USER_ID = #{userId} AND R.REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND R.REZ_STATUS = 'C' ) SET U_POINT = U_POINT + REZ_FULL_PRICE
